reporter_caption.center: IN RE ADOPTION OF A MALE CHILD, 24958 (Haw. 6-12-2003)

caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF THE ADOPTION OF A MALE CHILD, BORN ON NOVEMBER 2, 1987,
AND A FEMALE CHILD, BORN ON SEPTEMBER 20, 1989, by JOHN DOE,

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE FAMILY COURT OF THE FIRST CIRCUIT (FC-ADOPTION NO. 01-1-0314)
opinion.attorneys: Guillermo M. Canlas, for intervenor-respondent-appellant Richard Roe.
opinion.panel: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON and NAKAYAMA, JJ., CIRCUIT JUDGE PERKINS, IN PLACE OF ACOBA J., WHO IS UNAVAILABLE, and CIRCUIT JUDGE TOWN, ASSIGNED BY REASON OF VACANCY
opinion.opinion_text: ORDER DENYING MOTION FOR RECONSIDERATION The motion for reconsideration filed on June 2, 2003 by the intervenor-respondent-appellant Richard Roe requesting that this court review its summary disposition order, filed on May 21, 2003, is hereby denied.
